properties.entry: INSERT INTO MYTEAM (TEAM_NAME, BUDGET, TACTICS) VALUES ( ? ,? ,?);

SELECT P.PLAYER_ID, P.PLAYER_NAME, P.PLAYER_VALUE, P.PLAYER_POSITION, O.OPPONENT_NAME, P.PLAYER_CONTRIBUTION FROM PLAYER JOIN OTHER_TEAM O ON O.OPPONENT_ID = P.OPPONENT_ID WHERE OPPONENT_ID IN (?, ?, ?, ?, ?) AND PLAYER_ID NOT IN ( SELECT PLAYER_ID FROM MY_TEAM_PLAYER WHERE TEAM_ID = ? );
INSERT INTO MY_TEAM_PLAYER (TEAM_ID, PLAYER_ID, POSITION_SLOT) VALUES (?, ?, ?);

SELECT MTP.POSITION_SLOT, P.PLAYER_NAME, P.PLAYER_POSITION, P.PLAYER_VALUE P.PLAYER_CONTRIBUTION FROM MY_TEAM_PLAYER MTP JOIN PLAYER P ON P.PLAYER_ID = MTP.PLAYER_ID WHERE MTP.TEAM_ID = ? ORDER BY MTP.POSITION_SLOT;
